page.title: 17The Cabinet Maker,Stebbing.
page.content: The cabinet maker's is a business, which makes reproduction furniture such as tables.Their timber is bought all over the world.They use many kinds of wood including mahogany, walnut and yew.Most of their machines incorporate saws or cutters.The craftsmen have to be very skilled to work with the wood. Veneer is one of their materials.It is slices of wood .6mm thick.The veneer is glued to chipboard by compression.Then it is used to make different types of furniture. The furniture is made to look old by denting it with a rock and then staining it.The stain runs into the dents and makes the furniture look dirty and old.They rub it with very fine sandpaper to make it look as if it has been dusted for centuries.They make beautiful furniture there.
